channel.title: Hey Ameer
channel.description: Personal writing on thinking, building, and learning in public.

item.title: Visual Storytelling
item.description: How images enhance written content and make ideas more accessible to readers.

item.title: Building in Public
item.description: Why sharing your work before it is finished is one of the most powerful ways to learn and grow.

item.title: On Thinking Slowly
item.description: Fast decisions feel productive but slow thinking produces better outcomes in almost every domain.
